name: py-pybids
description: bids: interface with datasets conforming to BIDS

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description:
NumPy is the fundamental package for scientific computing with Python.
It contains among other things: a powerful N-dimensional array object,
sophisticated (broadcasting) functions, tools for integrating C/C++ and
Fortran code, and useful linear algebra, Fourier transform, and random
number capabilities

dependencies.name: py-scipy
dependencies.description:
SciPy (pronounced "Sigh Pie") is a Scientific Library for Python. It
provides many user-friendly and efficient numerical routines such as
routines for numerical integration and optimization.

dependencies.name: py-nibabel
dependencies.description: Access a multitude of neuroimaging data formats

dependencies.name: py-pandas
dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.

dependencies.name: py-formulaic
dependencies.description:
Formulaic is a high-performance implementation of Wilkinson formulas for
Python.

dependencies.name: py-sqlalchemy
dependencies.description: The Python SQL Toolkit and Object Relational Mapper

dependencies.name: py-bids-validator
dependencies.description: Validator for the Brain Imaging Data Structure

dependencies.name: py-num2words
dependencies.description: Modules to convert numbers to words. Easily extensible.

dependencies.name: py-click
dependencies.description: Python composable command line interface toolkit.

dependencies.name: py-patsy
dependencies.description:
A Python package for describing statistical models and for building
design matrices.

dependent_to.name: py-datalad-neuroimaging
dependent_to.description: DataLad extension package for neuro/medical imaging

dependent_to.name: py-glmsingle
dependent_to.description: A toolbox for accurate single-trial estimates in fMRI time-series data.

dependent_to.name: py-templateflow
dependent_to.description: A python client to query TemplateFlow via pyBIDS.

dependent_to.name: py-niworkflows
dependent_to.description: Common workflows for MRI (anatomical, functional, diffusion, etc)
